name: NotPong (Trolldig)
description: I wanted to make a Pong-like game, where not the ball, but the player has to cross the opposite line. I had planed to make the players able to hit each other and roll around the enemy like a football player dodges an tackling enemy. But as it was my first unity project, I didn't get it to work.  Anyways. It's playable, though it is not much fun.
